name: ░▒▌Firefox Colourfy Theme▐▒░
description:
A Firefox theme to behave with your liking... tested on Firefox 29+ under windows.
If things look dodgy, update Firefox, have any other firefox modifier styles uninstalled and restart. Feedback is much appreciated.
additional_info: • Update to the latest Firefox first (29+ AUSTRALIS ONLY) • Used best with style 19308, and style 127318 • Consider using style 47221 • If you like it please think to donate a small sum.
